name: West Cave Cellar Punch
description: Yes, this festive, Southwestern-inflected punch created by Alba Huerta requires some ingredients that may be unfamiliar — sotol, pomelo and panela among them — and a bit of a fuss. But for a special occasion like a big holiday party, it’s absolutely worth it —and the beauty of punch is that once it has been made, guests can help themselves, and the host stands a chance of having as much fun as they are.
recipeIngredient: The chilled juice of 3 pomelos and 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: In a punch bowl, muddle the peels and sugars together to draw the oils from the peels, and let sit for one hour. Then add sotol, sherry, tequila, liqueur, white wine, juice of pomelos, juice of lemon, water and ice.
Before serving, remove peels (if you wish) and grate a little nutmeg over the punch.
